title: Top Five Film Scores. Plus: Hans Zimmer on 'Dune'!
description:
Let’s talk movie music. Writer Jayson Greene joins Sean to talk about the art of the film score, the giants of the form, this year’s Oscar nominees, and their top five scores ever (1:00). Then, Sean is joined by legendary composer Hans Zimmer to discuss his Oscar-nominated work on ‘Dune’ and his career (1:07:00).

Host: Sean Fennessey
Guests: Jayson Greene and Hans Zimmer
Producer: Bobby Wagner
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
